EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.FTTx.none.L.N.N.12814.FTTx campaign for US regionals.W1 - Webinar In
EmailTemplate.subject: How do you decide on an upgrade path for your broadband network? Hear from our expert
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> As you plan the evolution of your broadband services, you need to make some important decisions:
- What speeds do I need to deliver my customers? - How long can I wait before competitors start coming for them? - How much can I afford to invest?
FTTH is the ultimate broadband technology. But an FTTx option might serve you better in the short-term. How do you decide?
Listen to our webinar to learn about Nokia’s fiber-to-the-most-economical-point (FTT$) strategy. Our unique, technology-agnostic approach helps you find the right balance between cost, time-to-market, and service levels.
Webinar: Deploying fiber to the most economical point <[[https://pages.nokia.com/12080.Deploying.fiber.to.the.most.economic.point.html]]>
Speaker: Keith Russell, Marketing Director FTTx, Fixed Networks, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
